content: i m obsessed with the sunrise coaster because of how fast they are to make with this beginner-friendly crochet coaster pattern you can easily make them for your home or a gift you will need any cotton yarn and a hook only sunflower coaster @viramuravytska added videos of sarting double_crochet rounds 6 and 8 to my instagram materials yarn art ideal cotton 186yards/1 76 ounces yellow and brown colors 2 skein makes around 10 coasters 2 mm crochet hook size is about 5 inches measured end to end across the center abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet magic_ring = magic_ring learn it here single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitch es picot = chain 3 slip_stitch into the top of double_crochet notes - how to make the starting double_crochet you can find in the previous video or you may chain 3 against -this pattern uses crochet shorthand 2dc means to place 2 double_crochet stitches into the same stitch
